adhirajyawadaya yanu kumakda?ewani deyak aththatama pawathida?boho denata adhirajyawadaya yanu 20 wana siyawase mathrukawak.bayibalaya saha asipatha sahithawa suddan kalu minisunge wijithayanta paya thabimath rajinage aanduwa saha rajinage balaya pihituwimath swadeshikayan kathi gamath boho ayekta anuwa adhirajyawadayayi.eya 20 wana siyawasa mada bhagayedi nimiyeya.thawaduratath ewannak natha.me apata uganwa thibena,boho dena wishwasa karagena sitina janapriya aththayi.eeth adhirajyawadaya pilibada mema sarala kathawa sundara wunath awasanawakata men etharam aththak nemeyi.adhirajyawadaya yanu kawarakda?eya bihi wune kawara thathwayan yatatheda yanna therum nogena adhirajyawadaya pilibada nigamana walata paminima buddhigochara naha.

prawina papadi shura shanthalal anusmarana prawinayange papadi sawariya ambalangoda uurawaththa palama asalin pereda (20) ude 10ta aarambha wi kaluthara palathota mansandiyen nimawata pathwiya.wasara wisidekakata pera hadisi anathurakin miyagiya kosgoda pradeshaye padinchi prawina papadi shura shanthalal mahatha anusmaranaya kirima wenuwen ohuge sahodara prawina papadi shurayaku wana janadhipathi aarakshaka anshaye sahakara polis adhikari prabhath da silwa mahatha samanga palathota sawiya padanama me tharangaya sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.kilomitara panas pahaka dura pawathi prawinayange papadi tharangaye prathama sthanaya waththala sita pamini nesli rupasinha wisin himi kara ganu labu athara, dewana sthanaya kaduwela sita pamina upul samansirita himiwiya.balapitiya pradip chandana da silwa thewana sthanaya himi kara gaththeya.me papadi tharangaya ambalangoda uurawaththa palama asalin aarambha kara galu kolambaa pradhana margaye kaluthara dakwa gaman karana wita boho kalayakin daka bala ganimata labena me prawinayan daka ganimata manga depasa wishala pirisak ekwa sitiyaha.awurudu 17,18 wayas waladi papadi kridawata ekwa athath me prawinayan awurudu 50th 60th athara kalayak papadi kridawe nirathawa sitina athara mowun laba gena athi athdakim matha diwayina pura wishala papadikaruwan pirisak bihi kirimatada mowun katayuthu kara thibe.prawinayange papadi sawariya sandaha nesli rupasinha, anthani siman, upali thabrew, es.bi. somarathna, dab.em. upul samansiri,asitha pranandu,ti.ee.di.nandasena,dullawa,nihal kulasekara,pradip chandana,anil da silwa,nalin da silwa,jayalath da silwa,es.ee.jayasena da silwa,gamunu mahipala,es.jayalal,dab.dipananda aadi prawanayo rasak ekwa sitiyaha. .
